text: Wakefield is a town in Middlesex County, Massachusetts in the Greater Boston metropolitan area.DHCD, Community Profiles - Wakefield , "Wakefield is situated in the Greater Boston Area...," accessed 12-1-08. Wakefield's population was 27,090 at the 2020 census. It is near Lake Quannapowitt.American FactFinder. ACS DEMOGRAPHIC AND HOUSING ESTIMATES â€“ Wakefield town, Middlesex County, Massachusetts .
